inclusion.criterion: Diagnoses of moderate or severe degenerative mitral regurgitation (based on the integrated approach recommended by the American Society of Echocardiography)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pulmonary hypertension (pulmonary artery systolic pressure >40mmHg at rest or >60mmHg with exercise as assessed by echocardiography)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant > mild aortic or mitral stenosis, >mild aortic or tricuspid or pulmonic regurgitation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 34 year old woman with Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
